todo

  • Lintian reports 12 errors about this package. You should make the package lintian clean getting rid of them.
  • Build log checks report 1 warning about this package.
  • A new upstream version is available: 2.2.1, you should consider packaging it.
  • The BTS contains patches fixing 1 bug, consider including or untagging it.
  • Some strings of this package need translation. You should check the l10n status report for more information.
  • This package has "Build-Depends: libdca-dev" while libdca needs a new maintainer, see O #704010.

problems

  • The package has not yet entered testing even though the 5-day delay is over. Check why.
  • The BTS contains 1 bug tagged help, please consider helping the maintainer in dealing with it.

testing migration

  • This package will soon be part of the libvncserver transition. You might want to ensure that your package is ready for it. You can probably find supplementary information in the debian-release archives or in the corresponding release.debian.org bug.
  • This package will soon be part of the auto-libcdio transition. You might want to ensure that your package is ready for it. You can probably find supplementary information in the debian-release archives or in the corresponding release.debian.org bug.
  • This package will soon be part of the auto-directfb transition. You might want to ensure that your package is ready for it. You can probably find supplementary information in the debian-release archives or in the corresponding release.debian.org bug.
